GSD.description:
parisc: Fix data TLB miss in sba_unmap_sg

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.303 by commit f23f0444ead4d941165aa82ce2fcbb997dc00e97. For more details please see the references link.
